name: Fish Rescue Mania 2
description:
The Fish Rescue Mania is a cute game of adventure & elimination with challenging levels & social contact.
In the bright blue sea, find the cute fishes, and help them.
It’s very easy and recreational fun with exquisite pictures. It’s smoothly and lightsome.
10 special feature challenges, 150 well-designed levels (continuously updating)
Enjoy the adventure with 100，0000 players.
Elimination strategic challenges.
You will enjoy the experience in the fairy tale and fascinate with it.

Evaluation:
Fancy the game, the fish is so cute, cannot stop playing at all.
So funny, really enjoy the smoothly tapping experience and too busy playing to eat.
I was so depressed that my girlfriend was fascinating with the game, she plays it all day and no time to care about me, I was so lonely.
Features:
The world’s first physical engine tapping game, utterly cannot stop.
Cute fishes, bright pearl, colorful corals, and many kings of wonderful elements undersea.
150 well-designed levels (continuously updating)
10 special feature challenges
100，0000 players collective adventures, come to enjoy
